en-US.summary: An example of how the Display Directive works.
en-US.name: Display Directive Demo
en-US.description:
A feature demo for the display directive.

Uses States Quiz as an example of different ways to use list templates and body templates.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Display Directive Demo" or "Alexa, open Display Directive Demo" to see an example".

At anytime, you can stop the demo by saying "Alexa, stop"
